name: Fac-Story tutorial
description:
This is the tutorial demo for Fac-story! The factory made platformer RPG inspired by pizza tower and the LISA games!
You play as stero just simply going to his new job but gets sidetracked along the way and something very unexpected happens....
If you enjoyed this then check out the discord:
https://discord.gg/2FvjmhGSPj
